test_cases.Title: Payment_Procedure_Modification_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the payment configuration page in the administrative panel.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment configuration page is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Identify the limit amount field for the modified payment cap.
Steps.Expected Result: The limit amount field is visible and editable.

Steps.Step Description: Update the limit amount from 5,200.00 euros to 10,500.00 euros.
Steps.Expected Result: The limit amount is updated successfully without error messages.

Steps.Step Description: Save the changes to the payment configuration.
Steps.Expected Result: Changes are saved, and a confirmation message is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Review the payment configuration to confirm the changes persist.
Steps.Expected Result: The limit amount is displayed as 10,500.00 euros.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has administrative access to the application.
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment limit updated to 10,500 euros successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the modification of the payment cap; does not include testing the implications of the changes on user accounts.

test_cases.Title: Payment_Limit_Validation_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to submit a payment of 10,600.00 euros online.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment submission fails with an appropriate error message.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the error message displayed to the user.
Steps.Expected Result: Error message indicates that the payment exceeds the limit.

Steps.Step Description: Submit a payment of 10,500.00 euros.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment is processed successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Check the user account for the new payment entry.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment entry of 10,500.00 euros appears in the transaction history.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in with an account eligible for payments.
test_cases.Expected Result: System prevents payments exceeding €10,500 and processes payments at the limit correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests limit enforcement but does not validate payment processing accuracy.

test_cases.Title: Compliance_Review_Special_Initiatives_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the compliance review section for special initiatives.
Steps.Expected Result: The compliance review page for special initiatives is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the listing of initiatives and corresponding payment limits.
Steps.Expected Result: All initiatives are listed with the new payment limits correctly applied.

Steps.Step Description: Select an initiative and review its payment parameters.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment parameters reflect the changes made (up to 10,500.00 euros).

test_cases.Preconditions: User has proper authorization to review compliance documents.
test_cases.Expected Result: Initiatives reflect updated payment compliance with the new limits.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers compliance review but does not evaluate the effectiveness of the changes.

test_cases.Title: AS_IS_001_Documentation_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the documentation application.
Steps.Expected Result: The documentation interface is displayed without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section 'Descrizione del AS IS'.
Steps.Expected Result: The section title 'Descrizione del AS IS' is visible and correctly formatted.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the documentation application.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can access and view the 'Descrizione del AS IS' section of the documentation.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests for accessing the documentation without checking specific content.

test_cases.Title: AS_IS_002_Section_Validity_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the documentation application.
Steps.Expected Result: The documentation interface is displayed without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section 'Descrizione del AS IS'.
Steps.Expected Result: The section title 'Descrizione del AS IS' is visible and correctly formatted.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the presence of content within the section.
Steps.Expected Result: The content under 'Descrizione del AS IS' is displayed correctly and completely.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the documentation application.
test_cases.Expected Result: Validates that the content of 'Descrizione del AS IS' is both present and correct.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests only for the presence of contents; does not validate accuracy of the information.

test_cases.Title: Prize_Payment_Physical_Tickets_001_Desktop_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Visit the prize payment desk at Milano or Roma.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment desk is open, and staff are available to process prize claims.

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid physical ticket for a prize claim of any amount.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket is verified and accepted for payment.

Steps.Step Description: Complete any required forms and submit them for processing.
Steps.Expected Result: Forms are submitted successfully, and a payment receipt is issued.

test_cases.Preconditions: User holds a valid physical ticket and is present at the designated payment desk.
test_cases.Expected Result: Prize payment is successfully processed, and user receives the prize.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the process for physical ticket claims; online payment process not included.

test_cases.Title: Prize_Payment_Online_Tickets_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the prize payment portal with valid credentials.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged into their account.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Claim Prize' option for a prize worth more than €5,200.
Steps.Expected Result: The prize claim form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Fill out the claim form with required prize details.
Steps.Expected Result: All fields are filled, and the form is ready for submission.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the claim form for ADM verification.
Steps.Expected Result: Submission is acknowledged and an ADM verification request is initiated.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a valid account and a winning online ticket worth more than €5,200.
test_cases.Expected Result: Prize claim is submitted for ADM verification, and user receives a confirmation.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers online claim submission; actual payment process after verification not included.

test_cases.Title: Prize_Payment_PPP_003_Desktop_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Visit the designated Payment Points for Prize Payment.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment point is open and staff are present.

Steps.Step Description: Present a valid physical or online winning ticket with a prize between €5,200 and €52,000.
Steps.Expected Result: The ticket is checked, and eligibility for payment is confirmed.

Steps.Step Description: Request payment, providing details of the ticket and verifying personal identity.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment request is processed, and a confirmation receipt is issued to the user.

test_cases.Preconditions: User holds a valid winning ticket and is present at the Punti Pagamento Premi.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid winning ticket within the specified amount range
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment is successfully processed, and user receives their prize.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers payment for specified prize ranges; unsuccessful payment scenarios not included.

test_cases.Title: Definitions_and_Abbreviations_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the document containing definitions and abbreviations.
Steps.Expected Result: The document displays with correctly formatted content.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the table containing the abbreviations.
Steps.Expected Result: The table with abbreviations is visible within the document.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the contents of the abbreviation table against the known definitions.
Steps.Expected Result: All abbreviations in the table are correct as per the definitions listed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the document containing definitions and abbreviations.
test_cases.Expected Result: Definitions and abbreviations table is displayed and content is correct.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the verification of abbreviations and definitions; does not test document navigation.

test_cases.Title: Definitions_and_Abbreviations_Error_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the document containing definitions and abbreviations without internet access.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed stating that the document cannot be accessed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has no internet connection.
test_cases.Expected Result: Error message indicates inaccessibility of the document.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only assesses document access error handling; content verification not included.

test_cases.Title: Winning_Verification_Functionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the online win verification service.
Steps.Expected Result: The win verification service page is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a winning amount of €10,600 and submit for verification.
Steps.Expected Result: The system confirms that the winning amount is valid and available for payout.

Steps.Step Description: Repeat the process using a winning amount less than €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: The system shows that the winning amount is not eligible for payout.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the verification service and is connected to the internet.
test_cases.Expected Result: System accurately verifies payout eligibility based on the winning amount.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers verification functionality; does not include other payment processes.

test_cases.Title: Online_Payout_Functionality_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log into the gaming account and navigate to the payout section.
Steps.Expected Result: The payout section loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a payout request for a winning amount of €10,600.
Steps.Expected Result: The payout request is submitted and approved by the system.

Steps.Step Description: Try to initiate a payout for a winning amount of €10,400.
Steps.Expected Result: The system rejects the payout request indicating it does not meet the minimum cutoff.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has winnings greater than €10,500 and a registered account.
test_cases.Expected Result: System processes payouts correctly based on the winning amount limit.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests online payout feature; does not cover backend processing.

test_cases.Title: Account_Movement_Functionality_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Login to the gaming account and navigate to the account movements section.
Steps.Expected Result: Account movements page is displayed showing the recent transactions.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a transaction for a winning amount of €10,600.
Steps.Expected Result: The transaction is recorded successfully in the movements history.

Steps.Step Description: Try to record a transaction for a winning amount of €10,400.
Steps.Expected Result: The system prevents the transaction from being recorded, indicating it's not eligible.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has a gaming account with transactions available.
test_cases.Expected Result: System accurately tracks and records account movements per the limits.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers movement tracking; does not include deposit functionalities.

test_cases.Title: Elenchi_Premi_GNTN_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the online GNTN platform and navigate to the winnings section.
Steps.Expected Result: The winnings section is displayed with a list of GNTN prizes.

Steps.Step Description: Filter the displayed winnings for payments greater than €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: Only the winnings with amounts exceeding €10,500 are shown.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that all displayed prizes allow payment via Prize Payment or with prior reservation.
Steps.Expected Result: All displayed prizes have available payment options listed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the GNTN online platform and has access to the winnings section.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user account with access to GNTN winnings.
test_cases.Expected Result: Winnings above €10,500 are accurately displayed and payment options are verified.
test_cases._polarion: Elenchi premi GNTN GAD da pagare
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the display of winnings; does not handle payment processing.

test_cases.Title: Elenchi_Premi_GNTN_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the online GNTN platform and navigate to the winnings section.
Steps.Expected Result: The winnings section is displayed with a list of GNTN prizes.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to filter for winnings with an amount less than €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: The system shows a message stating no results found.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the GNTN online platform and has access to the winnings section.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid user account without winnings below the threshold.
test_cases.Expected Result: System appropriately handles the query for winnings less than €10,500 by showing no results.
test_cases._polarion: Elenchi premi GNTN GAD da pagare
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the filtering behavior for winnings; does not cover user permissions.

test_cases.Title: Payment_Execution_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the GNTN GAD payment portal for prizes.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment portal is loaded successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a prize amount of €11,000.00.
Steps.Expected Result: The entered prize amount is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Select a payment method and submit the payment.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment processing begins, and a confirmation message about the transaction is shown.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is authenticated and has access to payment functionalities.
test_cases.Expected Result: The payment is processed successfully, and a confirmation receipt is generated.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Tests payment functionality only for amounts greater than €10,500.00; does not cover amounts below the threshold.

test_cases.Title: Payment_Execution_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the GNTN GAD payment portal for prizes.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment portal is loaded successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a prize amount of €10,000.00.
Steps.Expected Result: Error message indicates the prize amount is below the allowable threshold.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is authenticated and has access to payment functionalities.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system displays an error message indicating that payments can only be processed for amounts greater than €10,500.00.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers validation for insufficient prize amount.

test_cases.Title: Threshold_Payment_Auto_Premi_GNTN_GAD_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application where the payment documents are generated.
Steps.Expected Result: The application interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the section managing the automatic payment thresholds for GNTN GAD rewards.
Steps.Expected Result: The threshold management section is successfully opened.

Steps.Step Description: Verify the displayed maximum threshold for automatic payment of GNTN GAD awards.
Steps.Expected Result: The threshold value displayed is €10,500.00.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the application with permission to view payment thresholds.
test_cases.Expected Result: Correct threshold for automatic payment is set and displayed as €10,500.00.
test_cases._polarion: Corretta indicazione soglia di pagabilità automatica premi GNTN GAD
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies the display of the threshold; does not check the actual functionality of threshold application.

test_cases.Title: Threshold_Payment_Auto_Premi_GNTN_GAD_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the document generation feature in the application for payment management.
Steps.Expected Result: Document generation interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Generate a sample payment document that should show the GNTN GAD threshold.
Steps.Expected Result: The document is generated without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Review the generated document for the included threshold information.
Steps.Expected Result: The threshold for automatic payment is explicitly stated as €10,500.00 in the document.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has successfully generated a payment document.
test_cases.Expected Result: The generated document accurately displays the automatic payment threshold of €10,500.00.
test_cases._polarion: Corretta indicazione soglia di pagabilità automatica premi GNTN GAD
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers document generation and threshold display; does not evaluate document formats.

test_cases.Title: Requirement_Specifications_001_Test_CASE

Steps.Step Description: Access the Requirement Specifications document.
Steps.Expected Result: The document is opened and is visible to the user.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the title '# Specifica dei Requisiti' is present in the document.
Steps.Expected Result: The title '# Specifica dei Requisiti' is correctly displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check for the presence of content under the requirement specifications.
Steps.Expected Result: Content relevant to requirements is displayed correctly.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to the application where requirements are documented.
test_cases.Expected Result: The title and content of the requirements specifications document are displayed correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Test only covers document access and title verification; no validation of content accuracy.

test_cases.Title: Modify_Credit_Limit_Functionality_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in as an administrator to the system.
Steps.Expected Result: The administrator dashboard is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Modify Credit Limit' section.
Steps.Expected Result: The Modify Credit Limit interface is visible.

Steps.Step Description: Enter a new credit limit value higher than current limit.
Steps.Expected Result: The new credit limit value is accepted.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the changes.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message indicating that the credit limit has been modified successfully is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: Administrator access is required; current credit limit must be known.
test_cases.Dataset: Admin credentials, new credit limit value
test_cases.Expected Result: Credit limit is modified and confirmation message is displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers the positive scenario; exception handling not tested.

test_cases.Title: TG_Payment_Terminals_Functionality_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the payment terminal system.
Steps.Expected Result: Payment terminal interface loads successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to initiate a payment over 52,000.00€.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message indicating the limit breach is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a valid payment within the allowed limit.
Steps.Expected Result: The payment successfully processes without errors.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged into the payment terminal.
test_cases.Expected Result: Payment limit enforcement and transaction success acknowledged.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Checks limits but does not include stress testing for concurrent transactions.

test_cases.Title: Manage_NPL_Competition_Functionality_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the NPL competition management page.
Steps.Expected Result: NPL competition management interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Review existing threshold values for the competition.
Steps.Expected Result: The current thresholds are displayed accurately.

Steps.Step Description: Modify the threshold value to a higher limit.
Steps.Expected Result: The modification is accepted, and updated values are indicated on the interface.

Steps.Step Description: Save changes made to competition thresholds.
Steps.Expected Result: A success message is shown, confirming the changes were saved.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to NPL management features.
test_cases.Expected Result: NPL competition thresholds updated successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focus on threshold modifications; security validation not included.

test_cases.Title: Manage_SIRIO_Competition_Functionality_004_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the SIRIO competition settings.
Steps.Expected Result: SIRIO competition settings interface is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the current thresholds set for SIRIO competition.
Steps.Expected Result: Current thresholds are visible and correctly listed.

Steps.Step Description: Adjust the competition thresholds to reflect updated regulations.
Steps.Expected Result: Threshold changes are acknowledged and reflected in the interface.

Steps.Step Description: Confirm and save the new threshold settings.
Steps.Expected Result: Notification confirming successful updates is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have SIRIO competition management access.
test_cases.Expected Result: SIRIO competition thresholds successfully updated.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Excludes validation of competition results affected by threshold adjustments.

test_cases.Title: Office_Prizes_Software_Functionality_005_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log into the prize office management application.
Steps.Expected Result: Dashboard of the prize office is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Review current prize limits set within the system.
Steps.Expected Result: Current prize limits are shown accurately.

Steps.Step Description: Edit the prize limits to reflect the new guidelines.
Steps.Expected Result: Editing functionality allows for new limits to be inputted and accepted.

Steps.Step Description: Save the new prize limits to the system.
Steps.Expected Result: A success message confirming the new limits have been successfully saved is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have prize office management access.
test_cases.Expected Result: Prize limits modified and confirmation message displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers threshold updates without assessing overall prize winning functionality.

test_cases.Title: Commission_Management_Functionality_006_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the commission documents management interface.
Steps.Expected Result: The commission management dashboard appears.

Steps.Step Description: Review the list of commission documents in the system.
Steps.Expected Result: All existing commission documents are displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Select a document for updates.
Steps.Expected Result: Selected document is opened in the edit interface.

Steps.Step Description: Make necessary updates to the commission document.
Steps.Expected Result: Changes are visible in the edit window.

Steps.Step Description: Save the changes made to the document.
Steps.Expected Result: Confirmation of successful saving is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have document management access.
test_cases.Expected Result: Commission document updates are completed successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on documents; does not assess compliance with commission rules.

test_cases.Title: Technical_Documentation_Functionality_007_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the technical documentation management interface.
Steps.Expected Result: Technical documentation dashboard is shown.

Steps.Step Description: Review available technical documents for remote retailers.
Steps.Expected Result: All relevant technical documents for remote verification are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select a document to update.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected document opens for editing.

Steps.Step Description: Make required modifications to the document.
Steps.Expected Result: Changes are reflected within the editing interface.

Steps.Step Description: Save the updated technical document back to the system.
Steps.Expected Result: Success prompt appears indicating the document was saved.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to technical documentation management.
test_cases.Expected Result: Technical document updates are handled successfully.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Updates document structure; content validation not part of this test.

test_cases.Title: Contract_Review_001_NonFunctional_TEST_Backend

Steps.Step Description: Access the backend system where the contracts are stored.
Steps.Expected Result: Backend system interface is successfully displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the section for 'Rivenditori a distanza' contracts.
Steps.Expected Result: The specific section for 'Rivenditori a distanza' is opened.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that article 2 obligations for Concessionario are correctly reviewed.
Steps.Expected Result: Article 2 obligations are displayed and marked as reviewed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has administrative access to the contract management system.
test_cases.Expected Result: Contract obligations are reviewed and confirmed as per requirement.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers review of the specific article obligations; does not verify all articles.

test_cases.Title: Game_Showcase_Update_002_NonFunctional_TEST_Web

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the game showcase page within the web application.
Steps.Expected Result: Game showcase page is loaded successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Check the section 'come riscuotere' for updates.
Steps.Expected Result: 'come riscuotere' section contains the most recent information.

Steps.Step Description: Validate content is correctly updated for every GNTN reference.
Steps.Expected Result: All GNTN references are updated appropriately in the showcase.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged in to view the game showcase.
test_cases.Dataset: Current content references for game showcase
test_cases.Expected Result: 'come riscuotere' section reflects the latest updates correctly.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on specific section update; overall functionality not verified.

test_cases.Title: Game_Regulations_Update_003_NonFunctional_TEST_Web

Steps.Step Description: Access the game regulations page for GNTN.
Steps.Expected Result: Game regulations page is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that regulations have been replaced for every GNTN reference.
Steps.Expected Result: Each GNTN reference displays updated regulations.

Steps.Step Description: Check links for GNTN references to ensure they are functional.
Steps.Expected Result: All links direct to the corresponding regulatory pages without errors.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has access to regulatory pages.
test_cases.Dataset: Previous and current regulations for GNTN
test_cases.Expected Result: All regulations are updated and links are functional.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only verifies replacement of regulations; does not check compliance.

test_cases.Title: Communication_NonFunctional_004_NonFunctional_TEST_Backend

Steps.Step Description: Initiate the communication module for 'Rivenditori a distanza'.
Steps.Expected Result: Communication module is successfully initiated.

Steps.Step Description: Prepare the documentation to be shared with Rivenditori.
Steps.Expected Result: Documentation is ready and accessible for sharing.

Steps.Step Description: Send the communication to all Rivenditori with the documentation.
Steps.Expected Result: All Rivenditori receive the communication successfully.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has the necessary permissions to send communication.
test_cases.Dataset: List of Rivenditori and relevant documentation
test_cases.Expected Result: Communication is sent and documented as delivered.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers sending communication; does not verify receipt confirmation.

test_cases.Title: Informative_Brochure_005_NonFunctional_TEST_Backend

Steps.Step Description: Access the section for informative brochures in the backend.
Steps.Expected Result: Informative brochures section is loaded correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that all necessary brochures are available for download.
Steps.Expected Result: All informative brochures are listed and downloadable.

Steps.Step Description: Check the most recent updates for the brochures.
Steps.Expected Result: The latest versions of brochures are accessible.

test_cases.Preconditions: User should have access to the backend brochures section.
test_cases.Expected Result: All brochures are visible, downloadable, and up to date.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers access to brochures; content verification not included.

test_cases.Title: Security_Requirement_001_Test_Backend_TEST_Server

Steps.Step Description: Access the security configuration settings of the application.
Steps.Expected Result: The security settings page is displayed with various configuration options.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the essential security measures are enabled (e.g., SSL, encryption).
Steps.Expected Result: All critical security features are confirmed to be enabled.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to modify a security configuration without sufficient permissions.
Steps.Expected Result: An appropriate error message is displayed indicating insufficient permissions.

test_cases.Preconditions: Tester must have access to the backend configuration and login with administrative privileges.
test_cases.Expected Result: Security configurations are validated successfully; unauthorized access attempts are appropriately handled.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only basic security configurations are covered; advanced threat detection features are not tested.

test_cases.Title: Security_Requirement_AccessControl_002_Test_Backend_TEST_Server

Steps.Step Description: Login with an administrative account.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in with access to configuration settings.

Steps.Step Description: Change a security setting (e.g., enable password complexity requirements).
Steps.Expected Result: The system accepts the changes and saves the new settings.

Steps.Step Description: Logout and attempt to access the same security setting with a regular user account.
Steps.Expected Result: Access is denied, and a message indicating insufficient permissions is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: Tester must have both admin and regular user accounts available.
test_cases.Expected Result: Access control measures are confirmed to function as expected.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on access control; other security mechanisms like authentication are not covered.

test_cases.Title: Privacy_Risk_Compliance_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the Privacy, Risk & Compliance module.
Steps.Expected Result: The module is displayed with a list of items.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the list contains the entry 'Privacy, Risk & Compliance' with the corresponding ID and priority.
Steps.Expected Result: The entry 'Privacy, Risk & Compliance' is present with ID '14' and Priority '1'.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in with appropriate permissions to view the Privacy, Risk & Compliance module.
test_cases.Expected Result: User can view the Privacy, Risk & Compliance entry with correct details.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: This test only verifies the presence of the entry; further tests needed for functionality of each item.

test_cases.Title: Privacy_Risk_Compliance_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to access the Privacy, Risk & Compliance module without logging in.
Steps.Expected Result: User is redirected to the login page.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged out.
test_cases.Expected Result: System effectively requires login for access to the module.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only tests access control; module functionality not validated.

test_cases.Title: Requirement_Validation_001_Documentation_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the requirements documentation file.
Steps.Expected Result: The document loads successfully without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the section labeled 'Descrizione dei requisiti'.
Steps.Expected Result: The section is found and properly formatted in the document.

Steps.Step Description: Verify that the requirements are clearly described.
Steps.Expected Result: Each requirement is presented with clarity and specificity.

test_cases.Preconditions: The requirements document is accessible on the system.
test_cases.Expected Result: All requirements are documented clearly and accurately.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Only covers the validation of the document access and clarity of the section.

test_cases.Title: Requirement_Editing_002_Documentation_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the requirements documentation file in edit mode.
Steps.Expected Result: The document opens in a mode that allows editing.

Steps.Step Description: Edit the requirements text by adding a new requirement.
Steps.Expected Result: The new requirement is added to the document without formatting errors.

Steps.Step Description: Save the changes made to the document.
Steps.Expected Result: Changes are saved successfully and do not produce any error messages.

Steps.Step Description: Close and reopen the document.
Steps.Expected Result: The newly added requirement is visible in the document.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has necessary permissions to edit the document.
test_cases.Expected Result: User should be able to add and save new requirements without issues.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers adding and saving requirements, but not complex formatting or permissions.

test_cases.Title: Modifica_Limite_A Accredito_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application for modifying credit limits.
Steps.Expected Result: The modification page is displayed with current settings.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the credit limit input field for online winnings.
Steps.Expected Result: The credit limit input field is visible and editable.

Steps.Step Description: Change the credit limit from 5.200€ to 10.500€.
Steps.Expected Result: The input field accepts the new limit without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Submit the changes.
Steps.Expected Result: A confirmation message appears indicating that the limit has been updated successfully.

Steps.Step Description: Refresh the page and verify the updated limit.
Steps.Expected Result: The updated limit of 10.500€ is displayed.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in with administrative privileges.
test_cases.Expected Result: Credit limit successfully updated from 5.200€ to 10.500€.
test_cases._polarion: RU1 - Modifica Limite di Accredito vincite Online
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers changing the limit only for online winnings; retail limits are not altered.

test_cases.Title: Modifica_Limite_A Accredito_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application for modifying credit limits.
Steps.Expected Result: The modification page is displayed with current settings.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the credit limit input field for online winnings.
Steps.Expected Result: The credit limit input field is visible and editable.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to set the credit limit below the minimum allowed (e.g., 4.000€).
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating that the limit must be at least 5.200€.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in with administrative privileges.
test_cases.Expected Result: User cannot set the credit limit below the allowed minimum, error message is shown.
test_cases._polarion: RU1 - Modifica Limite di Accredito vincite Online
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Verifies the system's response to invalid limit input; valid limit changes are not tested.

test_cases.Title: Modifica_Limite_A Accredito_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the web application for modifying credit limits.

Steps.Step Description: Locate the credit limit input field for online winnings.
Steps.Expected Result: The credit limit input field is visible and editable.

Steps.Step Description: Change the credit limit to an invalid format (e.g., 'ten thousand').
Steps.Expected Result: An error message is displayed indicating invalid input format.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must be logged in with administrative privileges.
test_cases.Expected Result: User cannot enter invalid limit format, error message is shown.

test_cases.Title: Software_Update_Functionality_001_Desktop_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Launch the Ufficio Premi software.
Steps.Expected Result: The software opens successfully without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the settings menu and select 'Check for Updates'.
Steps.Expected Result: The system checks for available updates and displays the results.

Steps.Step Description: If updates are available, click on 'Update Now'.
Steps.Expected Result: The update process begins and a progress indicator is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Wait for the update to complete.
Steps.Expected Result: A message indicating that the updates have been installed successfully appears on the screen.

Steps.Step Description: Restart the software to apply the updates.
Steps.Expected Result: The software restarts without issues and loads the latest version.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has administrative rights to install updates; the internet connection is active.
test_cases.Expected Result: The Ufficio Premi software is updated to the latest version without errors.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the update functionality; does not include rollback or failure recovery scenarios.

test_cases.Title: Software_Update_Error_Handling_002_Desktop_TEST_Computer

Steps.Step Description: Launch the Ufficio Premi software.
Steps.Expected Result: The software opens successfully without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the settings menu and select 'Check for Updates'.
Steps.Expected Result: The system checks for available updates and displays the results if no updates are found.

Steps.Step Description: Simulate a network failure during the update check.
Steps.Expected Result: An error message indicating network issues is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Attempt to check for updates again after resolving the network issue.
Steps.Expected Result: The software successfully checks for updates without errors.

test_cases.Preconditions: User needs to simulate a network failure; the software is installed.
test_cases.Expected Result: The system handles network errors gracefully and allows retrying the update check.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the error handling during update check; does not include failure recovery during update installation.

test_cases.Title: Globali_interi_da_pagare_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Open the Sirio application and navigate to 'Stampe vincite zona'.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Stampe vincite zona' menu is displayed correctly.

Steps.Step Description: Select the report 'Globali interi da pagare'.
Steps.Expected Result: The report selection is successful and options for report generation are displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Check the 'Solo vincite a distanza' option.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Solo vincite a distanza' is selected for the report generation.

Steps.Step Description: Choose the lottery draw for which the report is to be generated.
Steps.Expected Result: The selected lottery draw is confirmed.

Steps.Step Description: Execute the report generation.
Steps.Expected Result: The report is generated successfully, listing winning tickets with gross amounts greater than €10,500.

Steps.Step Description: Review the report output.
Steps.Expected Result: The report displays only the winning tickets with gross amounts exceeding €10,500.

test_cases.Preconditions: User is logged into the Sirio application and has access to the reports.
test_cases.Dataset: Valid lottery draw information and user credentials.
test_cases.Expected Result: The report generates successfully showing the winning tickets above €10,500.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses only on the report for winning tickets over €10,500; other report parameters not covered.

test_cases.Title: Payment_Request_Lower_Threshold_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the Sirio application.
Steps.Expected Result: User successfully logs in and is redirected to the main dashboard.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the 'Gestione Premi' menu.
Steps.Expected Result: 'Gestione Premi' menu is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Select the 'Richiesta di pagamento schedine' option.
Steps.Expected Result: The 'Richiesta di pagamento' request form is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Enter the game details with a winning amount of €10,000.
Steps.Expected Result: The system does not allow the request and displays an error message indicating that the amount must be equal to or greater than €10,500.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has valid credentials and proper role permissions.
test_cases.Expected Result: The payment request is not processed and displays an error message regarding the minimum amount.
test_cases._polarion: Sirio – Richiesta di pagamento schedine GAD
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only the case for amounts below the minimum threshold; does not test amounts above €10,500.

test_cases.Title: Verify_WinBox_Acredit_Service_001_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application and login as a non-logged user.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is on the home page without any personal account data displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Submit a winning receipt for an amount less than or equal to €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: The digital receipt is displayed with an 'Accredita' button.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Accredita' button.
Steps.Expected Result: A modal with the message 'Per procedere hai bisogno di un conto di gioco.' is displayed.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Ok' button on the modal.
Steps.Expected Result: The modal closes and the user is redirected back to the digital receipt.

test_cases.Preconditions: User does not have an active account and has a valid winning receipt.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning receipt with amount <= €10,500, non-logged user.
test_cases.Expected Result: Modal is displayed prompting user to create an account, receipt is still visible.

test_cases.Title: Accredito_Service_With_Logged_User_002_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Expected Result: The digital receipt is displayed with an 'Accredita' button.

Steps.Step Description: Click the 'Accredita' button.
Steps.Expected Result: The process for activating the credit flow is triggered.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an active account but the credit service is not activated, has a valid winning receipt.

test_cases.Expected Result: The credit flow process starts, guiding the user to activate the service.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Does not cover scenarios for amounts greater than €10,500.

test_cases.Title: Accredito_Service_Over_10500_Euros_003_Web_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the application and login as a registered user.
Steps.Expected Result: The user is logged in and can view their account information.

Steps.Step Description: Submit a winning receipt for an amount greater than €10,500.
Steps.Expected Result: No credit box is displayed, instead, options for alternative cashing methods are shown.

test_cases.Preconditions: User has an active account and has a valid winning receipt with an amount > €10,500.
test_cases.Dataset: Winning receipt with amount > €10,500, logged user.
test_cases.Expected Result: Alternative cashing methods box is displayed instead of the credit box.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Test case covers only scenarios for amounts greater than €10,500.

test_cases.Title: Security_Policy_Compliance_001_Backend_TEST_Servidor

Steps.Step Description: Verify the communication protocols between the existing systems.
Steps.Expected Result: The protocols comply with the project's security policies.

Steps.Step Description: Check the encryption standards used in the information exchange.
Steps.Expected Result: All data sent between systems is encrypted using approved algorithms.

Steps.Step Description: Review access controls implemented on each system.
Steps.Expected Result: Access controls are defined and documented, restricting unauthorized access.

test_cases.Preconditions: Existing systems must be set up and operational with defined security policies.
test_cases.Expected Result: All aspects of communication comply with the security policies.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers only verification of security policies; implementation of changes is not included.

test_cases.Title: Information_Exchange_Security_002_Backend_TEST_Servidor

Steps.Step Description: Initiate a test data exchange between two existing systems.
Steps.Expected Result: The data transfer initiates without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Monitor the integrity of the data during the exchange process.
Steps.Expected Result: Data integrity is maintained throughout the transfer.

Steps.Step Description: Check for security alerts or logs generated during the exchange.
Steps.Expected Result: No unauthorized access or security alerts are logged.

test_cases.Preconditions: Both systems must be configured for secure information exchange.
test_cases.Dataset: Test data files, System firewall logs
test_cases.Expected Result: Data is exchanged securely without disruption or alert.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Focuses on data exchange security without covering fallback procedures.

test_cases.Title: Privacy_Management_001_Backend_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Access the data management system as an administrator.
Steps.Expected Result: The system allows access to the management interface without issues.

Steps.Step Description: Review the current privacy data handling policies in place.
Steps.Expected Result: The existing privacy policies are displayed accurately in the management interface.

Steps.Step Description: Check for any changes or updates required based on current regulations.
Steps.Expected Result: No specific modifications to existing privacy handling procedures are required as per the requirement.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have administrator access to the data management system.
test_cases.Dataset: Current privacy policy documents and existing user data handling descriptions.
test_cases.Expected Result: Privacy management system functions correctly with no required changes to handling procedures.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers current compliance checks; does not verify implementation details.

test_cases.Title: Risk_Compliance_002_Backend_TEST_Desktop

Steps.Step Description: Log in to the compliance management portal as an authorized user.
Steps.Expected Result: User is successfully logged in to the compliance management portal.

Steps.Step Description: Navigate to the risk compliance section of the management portal.
Steps.Expected Result: The risk compliance section opens without errors.

Steps.Step Description: Review existing compliance risk assessments.
Steps.Expected Result: Current risk assessments are displayed in detail, with no discrepancies.

test_cases.Preconditions: User must have access to the compliance management portal.
test_cases.Dataset: Existing risk assessments and related documentation.
test_cases.Expected Result: Compliance management system remains stable with valid risk assessments displayed.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Validates risk assessments presentation; does not cover detail checks of assessments.

test_cases.Title: Requirements_Acceptance_Checklist_001_Backend_TEST_Server

Steps.Step Description: Prepare the acceptance criteria checklist as per the requirements documentation.
Steps.Expected Result: The acceptance criteria checklist is correctly prepared and accessible for review.

Steps.Step Description: Conduct a verification meeting with the Business Unit Lottery team.
Steps.Expected Result: The verification meeting is conducted, and the requirements are discussed.

Steps.Step Description: Collect feedback from the Lottery team on the requirements checklist.
Steps.Expected Result: Feedback is gathered and documented for further action.

Steps.Step Description: Conduct a verification meeting with the Concession Compliance team.
Steps.Expected Result: The verification meeting is conducted, and the compliance requirements are reviewed.

Steps.Step Description: Document the acceptance status based on feedback from both teams.
Steps.Expected Result: The acceptance status is documented, indicating whether the project is accepted or not.

test_cases.Preconditions: All project requirements are documented and the involved teams are prepared for the meetings.
test_cases.Dataset: Acceptance criteria documentation, team's feedback forms
test_cases.Expected Result: The project acceptance status is documented and verifiable.
test_cases.Partial Coverage Description: Covers the acceptance checklist verification process; does not include post-acceptance auditing.
